body: Young student in 3rd of computer science at EPITECH Rennes, with more than 5 years of personal experience, and specialized in web/mobile development and C/C++/C#. I am passionate about new challenges, and my portfolio reflects my significant projects. I am currently looking for a 3rd year internship from February 2024 to June 2024, and I am ready to create innovative solutions. I am open to any contact.
